column4: hi guys....I wonder if someone can help me restore my samba shares, which are fed to the xbox.  I tried to share the same folders in windows, and now they do not work in Linux.  I've tried stopping and restarting samba daemons, but that does not work?
what is the command in Alt + F2 to access the share folder?

hi guys....I wonder if someone can help me restore my samba shares, which are fed to the xbox.  I tried to share the same folders in windows, and now they do not work in Linux.  I've tried stopping and restarting samba daemons, but that does not work?
you want to see your shares that are on a windows computer, or do you want to set up a share on your ubunut?
